short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get access to your favourite Google Analytics reports in seconds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Project X Analytics extension lifts key metrics from your Google Analytics account, and surfaces them on the page - saving you countless hours in exploration. 

You are able to query by:
- All of your Accounts, Properties, Views
- Date From and To
- Scope - this page or whole site

The metrics tab shows the following, with a comparison between device type:
- Users, Sessions, Pageviews
- Average Time on Page
- Entries & Entry Rate
- Exits & Exit Rate 
- Bounces & Bounce Rate

More reports will be made available based on user feedback.
